Package org.hck.reports

Class ExtentLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hck.reports.ExtentLogger
  • public final class ExtentLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    ExtentLogger class exposes methods to log during test execution.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Harshavardhan Kavuri
    See Also:
    ExtentManager.getExtentTest(), ConfigProperties, ScreenShotUtil.getBase64Image()

      singleton classes-prevent class instances being created in any place other than this very class.

      • pass

        public static void pass​(java.lang.String message)
        Logs message to extent with PASS Status.

      • pass

        public static void pass​(com.aventstack.extentreports.markuputils.Markup markup)
        Logs Markup to extent with PASS Status.
        Parameters:
        markup - Markup message to be logged.

      • pass

        public static void pass​(java.lang.String message,
                        boolean captureScreenShot)
        Logs message to extent with PASS Status along with the base64 image.
        If captureScreenShot==true and ConfigProperties.PASSEDSTEPSSCREENSHOTS == true.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be logged.
        captureScreenShot - if true base64 image will be captured. else no image will be captured.
        See Also:
        ScreenShotUtil.getBase64Image(), ConfigProperties

        public static void fail​(java.lang.String message,
                        boolean captureScreenShot)

        If captureScreenShot==true and ConfigProperties.FAILEDSTEPSSCREENSHOTS == true.
        Parameters:

        captureScreenShot - if true base64 image will be captured. else no image will be captured.
